Only several minutes had passed, yet Holly had already devoured every singular bit of anything edible on the plate, clearly dedicated to fulfilling her new desire. However, she quickly hit a snag when she managed to run out of food in such a short amount of time, since she could no longer order more on a whim. Holly knew this would happen, and that it would happen soon, but she should have known that it would happen this soon. She was already starving, and her next meal wasn't for hours. She had no choice but to heave her 800 pound self up and head to the dining hall.

Many employees were running around the dining hall when Holly arrived, catering to the guests who were clearly enjoying this resort just as much as her. Everyone who was seated was obese, there were no exceptions. Speaking of no exceptions, there were a couple other patterns regarding the other guests. Firstly, they were all female, like her, which could be chalked up to coincidence, but they were also all Psychic Types, again, just like her. There was a Gothorita, a Meowstic, and an Espeon... Holly was then suddenly approached by a waiter, who offered her a seat. Holly accepted, but couldn't help but wonder if there was a reason for this.

Suddenly, the Espeon waddled up to Holly, "I see you're unfamiliar with this place, hm~?"

Holly jumped, caught off-guard by the Espeon, causing her body to jiggle about, "H-Huh?"

The unfamiliar Espeon giggled to herself before replying, "Come now, are you really surprised a Psychic Type could read your thoughts?"

Holly then let out a nervous laugh, trying to hide the fact that she really did forget... "N-Nah, I just didn't notice you sneaking up on me."

The Espeon tilted her head with a sly grin, "Come on, there was no way you didn't see a Wailord like me coming from a mile away~. Anyways, you're new here, right?"

Holly nodded, "Y-Yes, I am. My name is Holly."

"Name's Julia, glad to meetcha!" Julia then leaped up next to Holly, and sat down, "So, what brings ya' here?" Holly was about to answer, but Julia immediately cut her off, "Nah, just kidding, I already know, probably the same story as Stella, Serenity, and I, you just remember waking up here out of nowhere without any sort of explanation, right?"

Holly was completely shocked, "W-... What...?"

Julia chuckled, "Yeah, thought so! Weird, huh?"

Holly just sat there speechless for awhile before she mustered up the ability to speak again, "W-W-Why are you so calm about this?!"

Julia just laughed some more, "Oh, right, this means they didn't explain it to you yet, did they?"

Holly was getting all kinds of worked up by this point, "Explain what?!"

Julia suddenly smiled wide, "This is the Psy-smic Grand Resort!"

Holly gasped, "W-Wha...?!" She had heard that name before, but only through rumors. Rumors of a place where only certain special Pokemon are are allowed to stay. What the criteria are isn't known, though know it appears being psychic is one of them. Without warning, they're whisked away overnight after receiving an invitation that they aren't even made aware of, "B-But...! I was told this place was called the Goodwill Grand Resort!"

Julia kept smiling, "Yeah, they don't tell you the real name unless you decide to extend your stay for some strange reason... But whatever, glad to have you aboard, Holly! Hoping we can become best friends while we're here!"

"Same here!" Holly began to smile again, although... Something was still... off... Julia didn't know it, but Holly had already extended her visit, yet she still wasn't informed of the resort's true name... What was that about?

"Cool. I'm Holly, I just came here last week and just recently extended my stay to 5 months." Holly extended a pudgy hand in hopes for a handshake.
Maddie respected this, and shook her hand. "Now that we're all introduced, let's go get some grub! We were just on our way for fifth breakfast."

Holly, Maddie and the rest of the gang headed down to the Dining Hall, where they made their orders and began hastily devouring their big meals.
Rocky floated above the mountains of food, it was obvious that this Pokemon wasn't much of an eater. Which begged the question why it was here in the first place.
"So, you've been here for how long?" Holly asked Maddie.
"Around five months, but who's counting? I've lost track after a while." Maddie mentioned.
"I just assumed someone who stayed here as long as you would be... Bigger. You know? With how much constant feeding there is, I assumed someone who stayed here for five months would be immobile at this point!" Holly mentioned.
"Yeah, that's the thing. They don't tell you, but I've figured out their secret." Maddie mentioned, "Wanna hear?"
"Sure." Holly smiled, finding conspiracy theories fascinating. Especially if it might help figure out what happened to Julia.

"The truth is... They're keeping us prisoner. Whoever is behind this kidnapped us, and has made the food extremely fattening and addictive so we become so big, so large that we can no longer move. That's when they give us the choice. To either sit alone in a chamber to be fed and fattened, siphoned for your energy and power, or you can work for him, and never be fed." Maddie explained. "You noticed how the workers are starved, right? Desperate for any food they can get their hands on? That's because they used to be members, like us! Until they were forced into labor, and fearful of getting too fat or else they will be put into, what I've called, the "Feeding Mines". That's why me and Kevin aren't bigger, and ain't gonna GET any bigger. I don't know when the point of no return is, but I sure don't wanna find out."

Holly was surprised. This made an alarming amount of sense. "So, why do you stay? If it's like this, why not just leave?"
"I thought of that. But then I considered that nobody has ever TRIED to leave. I think that, if you try to leave, they put you in the Feeding Mines by force. So this is the best life we have at the moment. Eating and sleeping."
Holly was left in awe. This sounded horrible, there was no way this was true!
"Oh, shut up, Maddie." Kevin growled, "The reason you ain't getting bigger is because your Metabolism is too good. If it were weaker, you'd be the size of a Wailord by now."
"Well, I don't see YOU coming up with any crazy conspiracy theories about this place! It's the only thing to do aside from eat!" Maddie retorted.
"Listen, love." Kevin turned to Holly, "Don't worry about her. She's just a bit loopy ever since Julia became th' Guest of the Week. They were best friends, but recently Julia has been a bit distant."

After their meal, which took about three hours to finish completely, Holly waddled her way back to her own room to consider what she heard from Julia's friends.
Maddie did make a lot of sense, but there were still plenty of holes. Such as the fact that it wasn't just Psychic Pokemon on staff, and the fact that Holly has seen Pokemon that were well over 20 tons in passing. So if there was a limit, Julia definitely would not have breached that limit.

Despite it redoubtably being the truth, as she was looking at Julia right now, Holly couldn't accept this at face value; this explanation left too many questions unanswered. She looked down at Chloe with a concerned expression, "What will happen after the month is over? Surely she won't be able to just come back... She's far too big to fit in the resort..."

Chloe continued to provide a warm smile, despite her answer being... odd, to say the least, "There's no need to worry about that. She'll have no problem getting back in here..."

It was a fairly average sized room, having a snack bar off to the side. Various luxurious looking chairs were scattered about the place, facing widescreen televisions that were attached to the walls. Holly stood there confused for a moment before thinking to ask, "Um, what is this room?"

Xatu swiftly turned to Holly with an answer, "This is a rest area for the sumo wrestlers. Through that door in the back is an arena to practice in. I figured we'd come here early because of your performance earlier. Some of the other sumo wrestlers at the resort wished to request that you join their circuit."

Holly gasped, blushing, "W-Wha...? Really?"

Xatu simply nodded, not providing anything more; this was Holly's decision, after all.

Despite the luxury and grandeur of the room, she just couldn't bring herself to accept the offer made by the Xatu.
"I'm sorry, but I just don't think I can accept this. I'm honestly just trying to have a relaxing vacation." Holly stated.
The Xatu nodded. "You have quite a skill, but I cannot force you to do anything you have no interest in.. Please. Let us continue."
The Xatu seemed to not care much about Holly's decision, which was good. Holly didn't feel like being pressed to be doing something so degrading. She felt very uncomfortable pressing up against another Pokemon's fat, and though the rewards were great, the payment she had to make wasn't worth it.

The Xatu continued down the line, past a few dark rooms.
"What's in those dark rooms?" Holly asked.
"Our feeding chambers. That is where we take the Guests of the Week for their... Prizes. Speaking of, I just got word that your name had just been placed into the Ceremonial Choosing Bowl for Guest of the Week. I do hope you win..." The Xatu stated, almost ominously.

Xatu just wants to move on now that his mood was dampened
1551111222111121211211111312121122121211.content:
Xatu stopped, then turned to face a door that seemed to be no different at first. They slowly opened it up, as if trying to be dramatic. Heading inside, they then beckoned for Holly to follow them in.

Holly entered after Xatu, and gasped upon seeing the interior. This room in particular was absolutely massive. It was like an art museum of sorts, containing portraits, sculptures, and other things like that. Holly stood there in awe, unable to take her eyes off the craftsmanship of some of them. Xatu spoke to her from all the way across the giant area, so it was hard to hear what they were saying, so Holly snapped out of it and got closer.

Once Holly was close enough, Xatu started again, "So, I see you like the workings of the Resort Artist, hmm?" This question was met with a nod by Holly. Xatu chuckled heartily, actually seeming to be in good mood at the moment, "Glad to hear. This is where we honor certain parts of this resort's history, so it is necessary for the artwork to be up to snuff." They then pointed a wing towards a sculpture of several Psychic Type Pokemon, "Those are the founders of this resort. They built it originally, as I've stated before, as a place for the intelligent who were stuck in a place where they could not properly flourish. A noble cause. Of course, that's no longer the purpose it serves, sadly."

Holly tilted her head, unsure what to think of the matter. However, this did make one thing stick out as odd, "This mistress... How does she feel about the current state of the hotel?"

Xatu practically jumped at Holly's question, "H-H-Huh?" Out of nowhere, the always levelheaded Xatu became a nervous at the mere mention of the Mistress, "W-Well, you see..." Before continuing, they took a moment to calm down, "The Mistress is fine with whatever purpose the resort serves, as long as it does not interfere with her personal desires."

Holly stood there processing the information, "I see..." She then looked around some more, wondering if there was anything else interesting she could learn in here...

"Let's... Move on. I have plenty more to show you." Xatu stated, rather depressed now. He did a fair job hiding it, but it was obvious his spirits were significantly lowered.
Holly frowned, feeling like she said something to upset him. She'd make an effort to try and make him feel better soon, but for now they were moving on.

The next room they walked to was a Financing Wing, a rather boring one, but important one nonetheless. This was where all of the Room Service calls get sent to, they have multiple Pokemon working all of the different phones. Holly managed to hone in on certain interesting conversations...
"...You want HOW many Bagels? Oh, sweet Arceus, we're gonna need to send in a few Trolleys..."
"...No, you hang up!.... No, -YOU- hang up!..."

It's quite an ingenious system." Xatu explained, seeming far less down, but still had some kind of sadness to his words, still hanging on that last room.
"Um, so, how would one apply to become a worker here?" Holly asked.
"Oh, that's simple. You just fill out an application form in the main hall, and if we can fit you in, we'll give you a job. Why, are you thinking of joining?" Xatu asked.

Xatu laughed alongside her, blushing a bit. It seemed he kind of enjoyed watching Holly's got sway back and forth. He had to keep himself from grabbing onto it.

"Mph, anyway. Let's move on to our next part..." The Xatu stated, heading towards...

1551111222111121211211111312121122121211.content:
Nearby was the security room, where a Bisharp keeping a close eye on security footage from various parts of the resort. Even when Xatu and Holly entered, the Bisharp's attention was not taken away from the monitors.

Holly looked around the small room, wondering why Xatu would bring her in here, "Um... So..." It was then that she saw Xatu beckoning her over to a specific monitor. She hurried over and looked up at it, wondering what was so important that she had to see it right now. Once she saw it though Holly covered her mouth, unable to form words. Julia was in the process of being released!

1551111222111121211211111312121122121211.content:
As Holly and Xatu were about to leave, the Bisharp stood up straight.
"Security breach! SECURITY BREACH!" The Bisharp roared.
Holly shook in fear as the alarms went off. She saw down in the corner of the screen, a purple haze was clearing. It wasn't certain who the Pokemon that broke in was, but they certainly were powerful. The walls were made out of the toughest steel the Pokemon could find, but this Pokemon broke through it like glass!

Guards rushed the impact site, but as the haze cleared, the Pokemon was gone.
"...I'm sorry. We must end the tour shortly. It appears as if an unwanted guest has arrived..." Xatu stated, forming a Mind Shield around them "This will protect us in case we run into our intruder."

But that's when they ran into them. The Pokemon behind the break-in...

MewTwo.

"Holly... Y-you need to make your way to the Mistress... Quickly!" Xander psychically transmitted to Holly. MewTwo was too focused on Xander to worry about Holly, so Holly made a dash for wherever the Mistress might be.
She looked at signs, doors and even maps, but nowhere did it say where the Mistress was!
But that's when she heard MewTwo's steps creeping closer. She had to find out where to go, and fast, before she suffered the same fate as Xander!

After minutes of running through tight corridors for her wide frame, she finally found a large, open door. This had to be the way to the Mistress, or at least somewhere to hide.
When she entered, she...

Holly froze when she heard the door lock by itself. She tried to undo it, but the attempt was futile; she was trapped for the time being. Holly took a moment to check where she ended up. As it turns out, she was in one of the feeding rooms like the one Julia had been in just prior to the security breach... At that moment, Holly began to panic; what if Julia was in danger? She had to find a way out of there.

All that was in here were a couple feeding machines. Perhaps she break the door down with a piece of one? She tried to approach one to attempt her escape plan, but it suddenly activated once it sensed her in its vicinity.

The feeding machine scanned its nearby area with an infrared camera. Once it spotted Holly, it stuck a tube a hose in Holly's mouth and began to pump fluid into her.

1551111222111121211211111312121122121211.content:
Holly grasped at the tube, struggling to free herself, but her hands were too chubby and slippery to get a firm grasp on the tube. It was held on tight, and her body was feeding her so much, she was growing at an alarming rate. Her body expanded into the 30 tons, 40 tons, and even 50 tons quicker and quicker.
She tried to wriggle out, but soon enough all of the muscles in her body gave out, and she was an immobile body of flab, only able to move her fingers, feet and facial muscles. Being over half a hundred tons would do that to you.

Then, a Screen lowered. It was Xatu! But... MewTwo was right behind him. Holly continued to be fed and fattened while Xatu explained the situation.
"H... Holly... MewTwo needs you to... Needs you to become the new Mistress." Xander explained. "He says... He says that Mew had been trying to break out for as long as she had been trapped here, but we need her power to keep our Resort running. She was captured so long ago, I had no idea she was kidnapped.... I suppose after a while, she just got used to it. But, what we need from you is your consent. If you don't let us do this... Our Resort will go under, and thousands of Obese Psychic Types with their survival skills completely wiped from memory, assuming they could even move, would be forcibly removed and returned to the wilds."
Holly was shocked. Of course, this could have all been avoided if the Resort never existed in the first place, but this place was such a great place! So what if some Pokemon were made into Obese Blobs... Maybe they truly DID enjoy it. It would make sense that a Obese Pokemon Retreat would be powered by the worlds most Obese Pokemon, but she had only assumed the worst and never thought about the positives.

Holly sighed. If only she had known...
"Holly, we need a decision... MewTwo is getting impatient!" Xatu stated, very worriedly, "Will you become our new, obese power source?"

Holly decided...

choices: Epilogue with Holly and Julia! (Plus Stella!)
1551111222111121211211111312121122121211.content:
To be honest... Holly really did love this place. Despite her paranoia, what this place provided was absolutely amazing. She didn't have it in her take it all away from everyone here who clearly loved staying here, "I accept."

Xander gasped, soon being able to finally let out a sigh of relief. He buried his face in his wings, sweating like an Emboar. But he lifted himself back up again once he heard that Holly wasn't done speaking yet.

Holly smiled as she looked up at Xavier, "But only on one condition."

Xander began to swing his wings about wildly, clearly not in the mood for this, "Anything! Anything at all!"

Holly chuckled, "There's no way I could do this by myself. I want you to ask Julia to also be a power source."

Not wanting to lose his resort, Xander nodded furiously before scrambling off like a Torchic to fulfill Holly's request. With Xander out of the room, the only one there now was Mewtwo. He just stood there, not bothering to comment on what was going on.

After a bit of time had passed, Holly heard something to her right. She turned her head to see the wall was being lifted up, thus making the room twice as wide. However, what was more important was Julia waiting on the other side. Holly gasped, immensely happy to finally see her friend again, face to face. She called out to her from within the confinement of her own blubber, "Julia!"

Julia grinned, just as glad to see her old friend again, "Hey Holly! Been far too long!"

Xander then suddenly teleported between the two obese Pokemon. He then turned his head to each of them and bowed, "I cannot thank the both of you enough for taking up the mantle..."

Both Holly and Julia smiled at each other, before Holly looked down at Xander and nodded, "You're welcome. I'm just glad I resolved the conflict going on inside this place."

Xander looked like he was starting to feel joyful again, "Now, I think I should get you both of you to the Mistress's Chamber. Don't worry, it will definitely be big enough for both of you." He then spread out his wings, eyes become pure white. Out of nowhere, a flash of light engulfed Holly and Julia.

Once the light faded, Holly opened her eyes to the biggest room she had ever seen. It had to have been the size of an entire city! She sat there amazed, while Xander flew up to her, and gave her a list, "Huh?"

Xander held it out in front of her, "This here lists off all of the activities you have available to you in the wide expanse of the Mistress's Chamber."

Holly was frozen there with her mouth gaping open, "That's... a big list..."

Xander chuckled, "You are a big Pokemon. I do not see the issue here."

Holly blinked, unsure if Xander had really missed such a key detail, "Um... We're kinda too heavy to move..."

Xander shook his head, "Not in here, you're not. We do whatever we can to make the Mistress as comfortable as possible. As such, we when we were able, we funded some of that old Psychic Type intelligence to make an low-gravity field for this domain. You can move about as you please."

Holly was absolutely speechless. She had no idea that they would start treating her so well. Yes, she would become absolutely vital to this resort, but it was breathtaking to what extend they would be willing to go to keep her happy.

Xander bowed once more to the girls, "Again, I cannot thank you enough for this... I know this resort is no longer like what the founders envisioned, but my grandfather was one of them, so I want to keep it alive for his sake." He closed his eyes, a look of joy beginning of to form on his face before he teleported away.

Julia then immediately took the opportunity to leap directly at Holly, slamming her immense blubber right in her face, "Alright, now that we're business partners, let's take our first official break!"

Holly huffed as she lifted her head out from under Julia's flab, "Wha...?"

Julia grinned mischievously, "I saw you sumo wrestling with Stella, and I'm jealous! That list says there's a sumo arena somewhere in here! We're gonna go find it, and I'm gonna have a match against you!" Julia left as quickly as a Pokemon her size could, and Holly was left in the dust.

Holly stood there for a moment. She thought about how, while she only knew Julia for an incredibly short amount of time, they had grown so close that she was willing to throw away paradise to make sure she was okay. Holly could have stopped after getting confirmation from Chloe, yet she didn't, she kept going. Looks like her decision turned out to be the right one, since now she has all the time in the world to really get to know the real Julia.
1551111222111121211211111312121122121211.title: Rise of the New Mistresses

1551111222111121211211111312121122121211.content:
It's been about five years since Holly and Julia became the new Mistresses, and they have been taking it to it's full advantage. They grew to over twice as large as Mew was, now 5,400 tons of blubber each, and still growing larger to this day. Julia and Holly do much more than just eat, however, they play games, watch movies, and even talk to other pokemon throughout the facility, they were much more social and outgoing Mistresses than the other ones.

Julia and Holly made some major changes as well. For one, they would no longer forcibly capture Pokemon, but rather allow them to come via their own free will. They wanted it to be a choice, and while Xatu expected many Pokemon to leave, the population actually increased! Some other types of Pokemon even demanded to be let in as well, and the Mistresses decided that Pokemon of all types were welcome in.

The Sumo League has been doing good as well, with Stella as their new master. She had grown to become the fattest non-mistress, non-guest of the week Pokemon in the entire Hotel, and she wore that title well as she trained the new recruits how to be the best Sumo's they could be. She even hosted a Feeding Feast, a Feast dedicated purely to making those who come more fat than they ever were, and this went over so well that it's become a daily ritual for all members of the Hotel.

One thing's for sure, while Holly was very skeptical of this place at first, she determined that, in the end, everything worked out pretty well. She had the best job in the world, with the best staff, best fans, and all she had to do was keep on gaining weight.

And she happily awaited what happened in the next chapter of her life...

The End
